abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; American edition of Marie Claire magazine is expanding its editorial purview, and looking for additional advertising, with a supplement devoted to working women.
snippet: The November issue of the American Marie Claire was selected to introduce the supplement because the issue is devoted to the subject of money.
lead_paragraph: The November issue of the American Marie Claire was selected to introduce the supplement because the issue is devoted to the subject of money.

headline.main: Magazine Creates a Brand for Women Who Work
headline.print_headline: Magazine Creates a Brand For Women Who Work
headline.seo: Marie Claire in U.S. Aims at Working Women
